remarks: Homomorphic property of the polynomial degree.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
deg1mhm.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
deg1mhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
deg1mhm.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
deg1mhm.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) $.
deg1mhm.y $e |- Y = ( ( mulGrp ` P ) |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) $.
deg1mhm.n $e |- N = ( CCfld |`s NN0 ) $.
deg1mhm $p |- ( R e. Domn -> ( D |` ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. ( Y MndHom N ) ) $.
